node.title: Abomination of Desolation in Daniel's Day, Part 1
node.description: Pastor Don Mackintosh, Pastor of the Weimar Campus Church, begins his Abomination of Desolation Series with part one, discussing events that lead to the desolation of the sanctuary by Nebuchadnezzar. He leads us into very interesting similarities of abominations that occurred before the desolation of ancient Jerusalem and the events of today.
